title: Fukrey 3
overview: In the third installment, the Fukras plan to take over Delhi, and run for city elections. However, they have no money and so they take on an international job to make a quick buck, which changes their lives forever. In the first two films, we saw them using dreams, then premonitions to make money but now theyâ€™ve been gifted with a new & unique talent which is going to make them millionaires.
